result.arabic_text: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
result.translation: 32. Tolkaygow! Waxaan anigu idiinka cabsan Maalinta isu Yeeridda7.
result.footnotes: 7. Waa maalinta Qiyaamaha, markay denbiilayaasha la qeylin argarax, dadku waa isu yeeran goobta Qiyaamaha iyagoo in loo shafeeco raba.
